Description:
Detects when a user has been elevated to manage all Azure Subscriptions.
This change should be investigated immediately if it isn't planned.
This setting could allow an attacker access to Azure subscriptions in your environment.


Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Subscription Permission Elevation Via AuditLogs
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where category = 'administrative' and operationname = 'assigns the caller to user access admin'
